channel.title: Help?
channel.description:
Ok, i started calc in uni and well, i am broke. i need this text book:
[code]
Calculus: Single Variable Approx. 800 pages | softcover | ISBN 1-931914-59-1
Calculus: Multivariable Approx. 400 pages | softcover | 1-931914-60-5
Value Bundle of Single Variable and Multivariable 1-930190-87-5
http://www.keycollege.com/catalog/titles/calculus_variable.html [/code]
its by Brian E. Blank and Steven G. Krantz. i can't afford to buy these books, would cost me about ~$200 if i bought it at uni and over the net about $104. i was wondering if there any e-book of this out there or someone have.
For Chem, The lecturer was nice enough to give me a chem e-book, so i didn't have to buy a $250 book.
for rest of the course they are using last years textbook, so i borrowed from friends of friends.
so anyone have these as ebooks? if so please tell me or give me :)
and yes i just "fuckinggoogledit" and well no help at all. thanks in advance.

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @akl akl
item.description:
@akl wrote:

What did email did you use for registering? I used hotmail and it worked fine.

you can have my registration link if it doesn’t work, I’ll PM u the details the link etc =)

Read full topic

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

thanks lordbost, but well that book is kinda different, i know the concept is the same, but i would have hard time learning a course with a totally different textbook.

douban.com seems to have it, its chinese and i used google translator but i need to register but i registered and couldn’t get in, i never got my conformational email. if any one know how to get there.

Read full topic

@SETO wrote:

Ok, i started calc in uni and well, i am broke. i need this text book:

for rest of the course they are using last years textbook, so i borrowed from friends of friends.
